title: Duo partner that will use (team speak, curse, etc). hard to play with just the chat in low elo
body:
stuck in bronze because i cant get teams willing to talk and make plays with me.
Add me: Dragoss

replies.body: Yeah, if you think communication is your problem in bronze then enjoy the rest of the season stuck in it.
what do you mean by that? aha

He means in Bronze the people are so bad, you can easily solo carry if your good enough. The fact is your not good enough means you will stay where you belong until you get better.

You think people who are Platinum got "stuck in bronze" because of their teams? Nope. They were good enough to play their way out.

That being said, duo'ing is a good idea to climb. Certainly makes it easier. Just don't blame everything on your team though.
The fact that the only game you broke 200cs in went for over an hour, and you only got 230 cs shows you have plenty to grow personally.

'because i cant get teams willing to talk and make plays with me.'

Bronze 5 and you think your team is the problem? Reevaluate yourself first.

Play broken champs.

Bronzies have no idea how to counter them.
